comments:
eclipse-SDK-3.0RC2-win32.zip

With RC1 I had a folder for extensions, so I added the extension location after
starting RC2.  When it asked if I wanted to restart, I said yes.  I have not
tried to reproduce this.  The Eclipse window froze, would allow me to close it,
but I could minimize it.  There is also an NPE below when I killed the process.
 After starting RC2 again, the extensions do work properly.
